DOC.brief_summary: After Local Human Research Ethics Committee approval , emergency medical staff enrol study . After watch video intubation use Airtraq , Glidescope direct laryngoscopy , attempted intubate pediatric manikin three different airway model .
DOC.brief_title: Intubation Paediatric Manikin Emergency Staff : Comparison Airtraq Glidescope
DOC.detailed_description: After Local Human Research Ethics Committee approval , emergency medical staff enrol study . After watch video intubation use Airtraq , Glidescope direct laryngoscopy , attempted intubate pediatric manikin three different airway model ; normal airway , tongue edema entrap model face-to-face approach . Intubation attempt , insertion intubation time , success rate , Cormack-Lehane grade need maneuver device record .
